mapper.select:
select b.dept_id as deptId, a.dept_name as deptName, o.*, month(now()) as yue from(
) a INNER JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan b on a.id = b.dept_id and b.isdelete = 0 INNER JOIN (select * from ote.proc_train_wait) o on o.unitName = a.dept_name and o.realname = b.jiashiyuanxingming and o.cellphone = b.shoujihaoma
